name: 阿黛尔·玛丽
introduction: Adele is an actor from a small town in the North East of England. Age 19 she relocated to London after successfully securing a scholarship at the prestigious Italia Conti Academy Of Theatre Arts. Adele is a multifaceted performer with a diverse skill set including Mixed martial arts, horse riding, Dance and Singing. Parallel to her acting career Adele performs as a Burlesque artist on the London Cabaret scene.
